humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest invasive tumor as 2.5 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report mentions 'Invasive ductal carcinoma, SBR Grade 2, measuring 1.2-cm' in the left breast. The T stage for cancer is based on the size of the tumor. T1 is for tumors up to 2 cm, T2 is for tumors between 2-5 cm, T3 is for tumors larger than 5 cm, and T4 is for tumors of any size that invade the chest wall or skin. Therefore, based on the report, the patient's T stage is T2.
